New Records: Jamie Leweling scored the only goal of the game on his senior debut for Germany in the UEFA Nations League
Key Match Events: Jamie Leweling's goal was initially ruled out for offside, but he eventually scored with a sublime strike in the 64th minute
Oliver Baumann made two incredible saves to protect a clean sheet on his debut
Xavi Simons and Donyell Malen came close to scoring for Netherlands, but were denied by Baumann and the post
Pre-Game Insights: Julian Nagelsmann made five changes to the team who overcame Bosnia and Herzegovina on Friday, with two debutants in Baumann and Leweling
Key figures such as Kai Havertz, Jamal Musiala and Marc-Andre Ter Stegen have been absent this international break
Post-Match Reflections: Germany moved five points clear of Ronald Koeman's Netherlands at the top of Group A3
The loss means Netherlands have suffered their first defeat in the league phase of the UEFA Nations League since September 2020
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was a special occasion for Germany legends Manuel Neuer, Toni Kroos, Ilkay Gundogan and Thomas Muller, who were honoured before the game
The match was played at the Allianz Arena in Munich, Germany
